tasks.label: Cleanup
args: Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Directory -Filter '__pycache__' | Remove-Item -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue .coverage, .pytest_cache/, htmlcov/, backend/data/, backend/logs/, frontend/node_modules/, frontend/package-lock.json; exit 0

tasks.label: Install dependencies
args: cd backend; pip install -r requirements.txt; pre-commit install; cd ../frontend; npm install
